text: Eric David Hargan (born June 3, 1968) is an American lawyer. From October 2017 to January 2018, he was the acting United States Secretary of Health and Human Services. He is the current United States Deputy Secretary of Health and Human Services, assuming office on October 6, 2017. Hargan previously acted in this role from 2003 to 2007 in the George W. Bush administration. On October 10, 2017, President Donald Trump appointed Hargan as acting United States Secretary of Health and Human Services. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Illinois Category:Politicians from Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Eric Hargan
